Contents.Subtitle: Import your javascript functions in a web app
Contents.Intro: To be able to export functions from other javascript files, the javascript needs to be imported as a module in the html file.

Cheats.Cheat:
└─┬projectFolder/
  | index.html // Imports javascriptModule1.js as module
  └scripts/
   | javascriptModule1.js // Imports a function from javascriptModule2.js
   | javascriptModule2.js
